item.title: CVE-2024-27967|2024-06-04T17:46:52.110Z -- michael%20leithold -- dsgvo%20all%20in%20one%20for%20wp
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Michael Leithold DSGVO All in one for WP.This issue affects DSGVO All in one for WP: from n/a through 4.3.
